title: Episode 02: The Hurdles
dc:creator: Todd Henry
description:
How to overcome the three barriers to developing your voice.

More: Episode 02: The Hurdles.
content:encoded:
In this episode of the Louder Than Words Bookcast, we talk about the three common hurdles that we all encounter as we strive to do great, unique work, and what we can do about them.

Each week I’m giving away a free copy of my 4 hour Udemy course to help you organize and unleash your best work every day. To participate, just leave a response to this week’s question in the comments below. We’ll choose one commenter each week to win the course.

This week’s question: Which of the hurdles do you experience the most in your work?

More: Episode 02: The Hurdles.
